name: Weddings
description: Let us make your special day unforgettable. From venue selection to decor, we'll handle every detail.

name: Birthday Parties
description: Celebrate another year of life with a memorable birthday party. We'll plan it all for you.

name: Anniversaries
description: Mark your special milestones with a beautifully organized anniversary celebration.

name: Engagement Parties
description: Celebrate your engagement with style and elegance. We'll create the perfect atmosphere.

name: Retirement Parties
description: Bid farewell to your career with a memorable retirement party. We'll handle the details.

name: Baby Showers
description: Welcome your new addition with a joyous baby shower. We'll make it a day to remember.
